channel.title: Deborah Saks
channel.description: This is online portfolio of Deborah Saks, a Washington, D.C. based collage artist.

item.title: Timepiece #6
item.description: Timepieces is part of a series of 11 works.

item.title: Rhythm #1
item.description: The movement of the circles and the triangles are inspired by music. This piece is dedicated to Sina Karim, who gave this piece its name.

item.title: I See You
item.description:
